main.name: Dilkhush Mihirsen DHINESH KUMAR
main.occupation: Research Analyst and Developer in the domain of Machine Learning
main.description: I am a Information Technology undergrad having interest in the feild of Data Science, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing looking forward to integrate technologies with traditional practices.
main.bio: A meticulous and organized individual strong in design and integration with intuitive problem-solving skills. Proficient in PYTHON, JAVA, JAVASCRIPT, and SQL. Passionate about implementing and launching new projects in the domain of Data Science using frameworks such as REACT, FLASK and TENSORFLOW. Ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions. Skilled at developing reports, analyzing data, and identifying solutions through implementing the concepts of Machine Learning. Innovative, creative, and willing to contribute ideas and learn new things.
main.contactmessage: Reach out to me hire me or connect with me.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
